short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts GoLive session times to GMT+2

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GoLive has it's session times set to EST, etc. This extension converts them to GMT+2, so it's much easier for the user to know the times of the scheduled sessions without having to convert them manually.
